title: Ripser
text: Ripser is the main persistence diagram workhorse of Scikit-TDA. It provides an easy interface for computing diagrams of many different types of data.

title: Persim
text: Once diagrams are constructed, the Persim package comes into play. This package houses many methods for comparison and analysis of persistence diagrams, including persistence images, sliced wasserstein and bottleneck distances, and diagram plots.
